title: Blazing Dragons - Complete Series - 1996 - DivX
description:
Blazing Dragons!

Both seasons 1 and 2 of the Blazing Dragons animated series, created by Monty Python alumnus Terry Jones.  Episodes are complete and uncut, VOB'd from broadcast quality NTSC VHS and downconverted to 480x360 DivX AVI.

Plenty of off the wall, and occasionally questionable, humour with Flicker, Flame and the rest of the gang down in Camelhot Castle.

Get thrills as Count Geoffrey hatches another evil plan to use his ubiquitous peasantry as catapult ammunition!  Get chills as the brave Dragon Knights of the Square Table run for their lives - Indiana Jones style - from a... giant bowling ball?  And witness domestic intrigue as Sir Blaze reveals that the Queen is always calling King Allfire an SOB???  !!!  *GASP*  (Son of a Briton, of course!)

Season 1 - 22m33s full length episodes

 1. The Quest for the Holy Quail
 2. A Gift for Griddle
 3. Tournament Day
 4. Excaliburn
 5. Newt for a Day
 6. Knights & Knightresses
 7. Merle's Mirror
 8. Renaissance Dragon
 9. Robbing Hoodlum
10. The Stone of Wisdom
11. Hermits & Heroes
12. Sir Hare
13. Bleepin' Beauty


Season 2 - 10m07s half length shorts, 2 per half hour episode

 1A. A Killer Makeover
 1B. The Age of Retention
 2A. The Lost Ruby Hat of Omar the Ham
 2B. Achy Breaky Mace
 3A. Shamrocks and Shenanigans
 3B. Three Dragons and a Baby
 4A. King for a Day
 4B. Erik the Well-Read
 5A. Chain Mail Letter
 5B. You Dim Sum, You Lose Some
 6A. Excalibroke
 6B. Infernal Flame
 7A. MacBreath
 7B. Attila's Hot Buns
 8A. The Isle of Dwight
 8B. Ice Try
 9A. Single Green Dragon
 9B. Sphinx Jinx
10A. Griddle's Sleepless Knights
10B. Whine & Roses
11A. The Reign in Spain
11B. Geoffrey's Evil Pancakes
12A. The Golden Thimble of Theodora
12B. Seven Dragon Sins
13A. Quest to Success
13B. Slay the Dragon
